product_name: NYX Professional MakeupMarshmellow Smoothing Face Primer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackIt's the marshmallow effect! NYX Professional Makeup Marshmellow Smoothing Primer is a multi-tasking super primer with 10 makeup extending benefits.
details: DetailsBenefits10-in-1 multi-tasking primerThis smoothing super primer is infused with Marshmallow Root Extract for 10 outstanding makeup extending benefitsThis primer smooths, softens, extends makeup wear all day, hydrates, soothes, evens tone, minimizes texture, blurs lines, adds a soft focus finish AND keeps makeup freshThis face primer features a soft whipped texture & transparent finish, suitable for all skin tonesFeatures a subtle, light sweet scentNo animal-derived ingredient or by-product100% agree that the primer creates a smooth canvas for easy makeup application*99% agree their skin looks softer after 4 days*98% agree their skin looks smoother after 4 days*99% overall satisfaction**In a consumer studyKey IngredientsInfused with smoothing marshmallow root extractItem 2572969How To UseApply a dime-sized amount to clean face with fingers or brush before applying foundation.IngredientsAQUA / WATER / EAU, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER / SHEA BUTTER, DECYL COCOATE, POLYGLYCERYL-3 METHYLGLUCOSE DISTEARATE, CAPRYLYL METHICONE, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, DI-C12-13 ALKYL MALATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE, ALTHAEA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT, CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT, STEARIC ACID, POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE, SORBITAN SESQUIOLEATE, CARBOMER, GLUCOSE, FRUCTOOLIGOSACCHARIDES, FRUCTOSE, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, SODIUM POLYACRYLATE, SODIUM POLYACRYLATE STARCH, PALMITIC ACID, TROMETHAMINE, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, CITRIC ACID, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE, XANTHAN GUM, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, TOCOPHEROL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CI 77491 / IRON OXIDES, CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE.
how_to_use: Apply a dime-sized amount to clean face with fingers or brush before applying foundation.

reviews.headline: A smashing disappointment from a decent brand.
reviews.comments: This product smells. A lot. As do most NYX products. I don't really appreciate that in something that's going to be sitting on my face all day. The texture is really gloopy and sticky. It doesn't dry down and feels really greasy. I had wanted a silicone based primer to go with my silicone based foundation. This did not smooth out my makeup in any way. It made my foundation look really fuzzy and bumpy, like I was growing mold. Didn't help with longevity in any way. If anything, it felt like my foundation came off faster because of this grease.

reviews.headline: Review
reviews.comments: Wonderful primer, okay for combo skin, not for oily skin. Just wish for $ 17-18 would get way more product than that tiny bottle. Pump isn't the best either.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love the look, feel, and weight of this primer. It also smells delicious.

reviews.headline: Love the marshmellow primer 10 out of 10
reviews.comments: It works out pretty well for making sure that your foundation and concealer stay on all day and lasts all day where you can actually look really nice and can lock in your makeup after putting on  a translucent powder and a matte powder all day long for 24 houez

reviews.headline: Acne
reviews.comments: This made me break out so bad I would not recommed. Smells nice though.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this product!
reviews.comments: This perish goes on smoothly and stay on the skin well before putting on my makeup! I also love the smell which isn't too much but enough to let you know it's there.

reviews.headline: pretty good! though,
reviews.comments: i really liked this product and would repurchase! however i didnt notice it minimizing my pores and worry it could cause someone with sensitive skin to break out due to the fragrance

reviews.headline: always my fav!
reviews.comments: my makeup always looks so smooth and this goes on so well. i've been using for at least a year and this was my first time needing a new one. this product is a miracle for girls who don't like that sticky feeling but need something hydrating to prime their skin.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love this primer!

reviews.headline: Absolutely love !!
reviews.comments: Makes my foundation look so smooth

reviews.headline: I would buy this product until the end of time
reviews.comments: Good product and good price

reviews.headline: Great primer trash packaging
reviews.comments: Love the product, hate the packaging. Works great under makeup abd smells great. The packaging is the legit worst and requires actual tools to get out all of the product. Put it in a squeeze tube and it would instantly be 5 stars.

reviews.headline: You definitely should get this
reviews.comments:
This is great i use this in my everday routine 
And so should you

reviews.headline: Does the Job
reviews.comments: I use the Rare beauty primer and was looking for a more budget friendly option. This is similar however not as great. It does smooth the pores and at first makes my makeup last. Throughout the day it does make my face slightly greasy.

reviews.headline: meh
reviews.comments: i wouldnt say this helps smooth any texture, it feels nice when u put it on tho. compared to other primers i've used, i'd say this doesnt really do much for me at least

reviews.headline: One of my go to primers
reviews.comments: I have Combination skin and larger pores on my cheeks and t zone and this product definitely helps smooth everything out. ive been using it for almost a year and haven't had breakouts or any problems

reviews.headline: This is a great product!
reviews.comments: Love this primer over any of the other drugstore and higher up brands I have used in the past. This goes on smooth, is not greasy, blends well and keeps my makeup in place all day.  Combine this with the setting spray for a great day of makeup!

reviews.headline: Good!
reviews.comments: It's a good primer, wouldn't say the best. Love the feeling and the way it makes my makeup look but don't like the smell

reviews.headline: Pills, but good otherwise
reviews.comments: I'm not sure if it's my foundation, but this product always pills for me. I want to love it, but until then I can't :(

reviews.headline: Mashmello Primer
reviews.comments: Amazing product

media.headline: I love it! It smells so good!
I'm an oily girl so nothing helps me

faceoff_positive.comments: I received a sample of this product and when I say my pores were eliminated, baby this product had my makeup gliding on like Kristy Yamaguci in her prime! The smell made me want to eat it lol and it extended my wear so long. I bought one the same day because it's a must have for any skin type!
faceoff_positive.headline: What Pores Pooh?

faceoff_negative.comments: This was not my first time trying this productâ€¦ I've used this several times in the past, it's super convenient to grab almost anywhere that I stop to shop regularly. I think it's a reliable product if you're working on a budget and need a primer that is going to work. Though it's not my favorite product, personally. It is still a great product and just because it is not my favorite doesn't mean it couldn't be yours.
faceoff_negative.headline: Beauty on a Busget
